context_bundle.summary: Python starter bot template for Robot Rumble with complete implementation: state parsing, distance calculations, target selection, movement logic, and attack coordination. Copy-paste ready.

onboarding.quick_start: Copy the template, customize the strategy functions. Main entry point is robot() which returns Action. Focus fire on nearest enemy is a solid baseline.
common_patterns: Decide action in robot() main function
known_errors: Don't return None - always return an Action
